title: The Coiffure (La Toilette)
medium: drypoint, soft ground etching and color aquatint on laid paper
provenance_text:
Mary Cassatt [1844-1926]. Roger Marx, Paris, France, until 1913?, (L.2229); (Possibly sold at Hotel Druot, Paris, France, April 27, 1914 until May 2, 1914, no. 299) [1]; Frederick Keppel & Company [1916-1923], New York, NY, until September 1919; purchased by Museum, September 1919 [2]. 
NOTES:1. Catalogue des Estampes Modernes Composant la Collection Roger Marx, as "La Toilette". 2. Updated by CGK July 2012.
